title: METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING WIND TURBINE TOWER STRUCTURE WITH EMBEDDED REINFORCEMENT ELEMENTS
abstract: A system for manufacturing a structure includes a supporting frame assembly (104) moveable in a vertical direction of the structure. Further, the system includes an additive printing assembly (118) secured to the supporting frame assembly. The additive printing assembly includes at least one printer head (120,122,130) configured to dispense a first cementitious material. The system also includes a reinforcement dispensing assembly (136) supported by the supporting frame assembly. Thus, the reinforcement dispensing assembly is configured to automatically and continuously dispense a plurality of reinforcing members as the structure is printed and built up via the at least one printer head and as the supporting frame assembly moves in the vertical direction.

motivations: There is a need for an efficient method to manufacture wind turbine tower structures with embedded reinforcement elements.
objectives: Develop a system for manufacturing a structure with embedded reinforcement elements using additive printing and automated reinforcement dispensing.
methods: Utilize a supporting frame assembly that moves vertically to facilitate the printing and reinforcement of the structure.
Employ an additive printing assembly with at least one printer head to dispense cementitious material.
Implement a reinforcement dispensing assembly to automatically and continuously dispense reinforcing members during the printing process.
results: Enable the efficient and automated manufacturing of wind turbine tower structures with embedded reinforcement elements.
llama_json.research_subject: Additive manufacturing of wind turbine tower structures with embedded reinforcement elements

motivations: The traditional methods of manufacturing wind turbine tower structures may be time-consuming and labor-intensive.
There is a need for a more efficient and automated method for embedding reinforcement elements in wind turbine tower structures.
objectives: Develop a system for manufacturing a structure that includes a movable supporting frame assembly.
Incorporate an additive printing assembly secured to the supporting frame assembly to dispense a cementitious material.
Implement a reinforcement dispensing assembly to automatically and continuously dispense reinforcing members as the structure is printed.
methods: Use a supporting frame assembly that is moveable in the vertical direction of the structure.
Employ an additive printing assembly secured to the supporting frame assembly, which includes at least one printer head configured to dispense a cementitious material.
Utilize a reinforcement dispensing assembly supported by the supporting frame assembly to dispense reinforcing members as the structure is printed.
results: Enable the efficient and automated manufacturing of wind turbine tower structures.
Improve the structural integrity of wind turbine towers by embedding reinforcement elements during the manufacturing process.
openai_json.research_subject: Manufacturing of wind turbine tower structures with embedded reinforcement elements

motivations: Traditional methods for manufacturing wind turbine tower structures face challenges in integrating reinforcement elements efficiently during construction.
There is a need for automated manufacturing processes that can continuously embed reinforcement while building large-scale structures.
objectives: Develop a manufacturing system that can automatically dispense reinforcement elements while simultaneously printing cementitious material for wind turbine tower structures.
Enable continuous and integrated construction of reinforced structures through coordinated vertical movement of printing and reinforcement dispensing assemblies.
methods: Utilize a vertically moveable supporting frame assembly with an additive printing assembly containing printer heads for dispensing cementitious material.
Implement a reinforcement dispensing assembly that automatically and continuously places reinforcing members during the printing process.
Coordinate the movement of printing and reinforcement systems to build up the structure layer by layer with embedded reinforcement.
results: Enable automated and continuous manufacturing of wind turbine tower structures with integrated reinforcement elements.
Improve construction efficiency by simultaneously printing and reinforcing the structure in a single coordinated process.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Automated additive manufacturing system for wind turbine tower structures with embedded reinforcement
